title: Vietnam’s first domestic cargo airline prepares take-off
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Vietnam’s first cargo airline, privately owned IPP Air Cargo, is ready to take to the skies as early as November this year after receiving the necessary licenses fir its operations The airline has already received an air transport license but

The post Vietnam’s first domestic cargo airline prepares take-off appeared first on Investvine.
